text: {| |} RFA Sir Caradoc (L3522) was a temporarily chartered roll-on/roll-off ferry of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary. She was procured to fill the gap caused by loss and damage to Round Table class landing ships during the Falklands War. Category:Amphibious warfare vessels of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary Category:1972 ships
title: RFA Sir Caradoc (L3522)
